casebody.data:
WATTS
v.
NCDENR. No. 191A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. Preston O. Odom, III, John R. Buric, Charlotte, for Watts.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of November 2007 by Defendant for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (NCDENR) shall have up to and including the 3rd day of December 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
